en_title: Secretary for Justice visits Kwun Tong District (with photos)
zh_title: 律政司司長訪問觀塘區（附圖）

en: The Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, visited Kwun Tong today (October 17) to see the latest developments in the district.

Accompanied by the Chairman of Kwun Tong District Council, Mr Bunny Chan, and the District Officer (Kwun Tong), Mr Gilford law, Mr Yuen visited the Po Leung Kuk Lau Chan Siu Po District Elderly Community Centre at Tak Tin Estate, Lam Tin and chatted with elderly participants in the centre's activities.

The centre organises a variety of activities including counselling, health care and classes for elderly people aged 60 or above with the aim of ensuring they live a healthy and active life, as well as looking after their medical, social and individual needs.

Mr Yuen then went to the Energizing Kowloon East Office (EKEO) located at the promenade in Hoi Bun Road, where he was briefed on the latest development of the visionary Energizing Kowloon East project.

Launched in 2012 by the Development Bureau, the project aims to expedite the transformation of Kowloon East, including the former Kai Tak Airport and the Kwun Tong and Kowloon Bay Business Areas into an attractive, alternative central business district to support Hong Kong's economic development. Accompanied by the Head of the EKEO, Mr Raymond Lee, Mr Yuen toured the sites of the "Fly the Flyover01" and Kwun Tong Promenade.
Before concluding his visit, Mr Yuen met with members of Kwun Tong District Council and exchanged views on a range of community issues.
zh: 律政司司長袁國強資深大律師今日（十月十七日）訪問觀塘區，了解該區的最新發展。
在觀塘區議會主席陳振彬和觀塘民政事務專員羅莘桉陪同下，袁國強首先到訪位於藍田德田的保良局劉陳小寶長者地區中心，並與參加活動的長者傾談。
該中心為六十歲或以上的長者舉辦不同類型的活動，包括輔導、健康護理，以及各項課程，目的是令長者有健康和尊嚴的生活，並照顧他們的醫療保健、社交及個人的需要。
袁國強隨後前往位於海濱道海傍的起動九龍東辦事處，了解「起動九龍東」計劃的最新發展。
發展局在二○一二年推出的「起動九龍東」計劃，目的是加快九龍東的轉型，包括舊啟德機場、觀塘和九龍灣商業區，令該處發展為另一個具吸引力的商業中心區，支持香港的經濟發展。
袁國強在起動九龍東專員李啟榮的陪同下參觀「反轉天橋底一號場」及觀塘海濱花園。
在結束訪問前，袁國強和觀塘區議會議員會面，與他們就區內事務交換意見。
